name: VR Return to the Middle Ages: Fully Interactive
name_original: VR Return to the Middle Ages: Fully Interactive
description:
This is a vr leisure tour game. Players can bring helmets to visit the medieval scenery. Players can browse medieval towns, castles, villages and other scenes, appreciate the medieval architecture art, experience the customs of the Middle Ages, and fly at the same time Overlooking the entire scene from the air, the extremely high degree of freedom brings players a rich browsing experience.

Instructions:
The left handle can interact with the ui to confirm the trigger button, the menu button to call out the menu, the touchpad controls the player to move, and the side button of the handle to grab items.
The trigger button on the right handle can be teleported, the touchpad controls the player to rotate, and the side button on the handle can grab items.
